column1: userQuery
I just walked into class and realized I’m wearing two different shoes.
My teacher asked for my homework and I fully forgot it existed.
I got seated next to someone I used to be friends with and it’s so awkward.
My best friend is being super dry over text and won’t tell me why.
Someone started a rumor about me and I don’t know how to shut it down.
I think I bombed my math test and I’m trying not to panic.
My group project partner hasn’t done anything and it’s due tomorrow.
I just got invited to a party and I don’t know how to ask my parents.
My parents checked my phone and now they’re acting weird.
I accidentally called my teacher ‘mom’ and I want to disappear.
My friend keeps copying everything I do and it’s getting annoying.
I saw my crush talking to someone else and now I feel dumb.
I have to present today and my hands won’t stop shaking.
My friend told me a secret and I’m not sure I’m supposed to know.
My sibling keeps going through my stuff and I’m about to lose it.
I forgot I had practice after school and I planned something else.
I got a weird vibe from a friend’s boyfriend and I don’t know what to do.
My parents are fighting again and I can hear everything from my room.
My teacher thinks I cheated because my answers match someone’s.
I got left on read by my crush and it’s making me spiral.
Someone took a picture of me without asking and posted it.
My friend keeps making ‘jokes’ that feel like insults.
I’m stuck sitting alone at lunch today and it feels obvious.
I just found out my friends hung out without inviting me.
My mom signed me up for something and didn’t ask me first.
My dad wants to talk about ‘my attitude’ and I’m already annoyed.
I have like five assignments due and my brain refuses to start.
I think I might have said something rude and I didn’t mean it.
My coach yelled at me in front of everyone and I’m embarrassed.
My friend keeps asking to copy my homework and I’m tired of it.
I accidentally liked an old post while stalking someone.
I’m pretty sure someone is mad at me but they won’t say why.
My teacher moved my seat away from my friends and I’m mad.
I got told to ‘calm down’ and now I’m even less calm.
I didn’t get picked for the team and I’m trying to act fine.
My friend is dating someone I really don’t trust.
I overheard people talking about me in the hallway.
I have to choose classes for next year and I feel so behind.
My parents want my grades to be perfect and it’s stressing me out.
Someone keeps texting me nonstop and I don’t know how to set a boundary.
I forgot my lunch and I’m trying not to be dramatic about it.
My friend borrowed my stuff and returned it ruined.
I think my friend is lying to me and I don’t know how to ask.
My teacher called on me and my mind went completely blank.
I got in trouble for something I didn’t do.
I feel like my friends only talk to me when they need something.
My parents won’t let me go out and everyone else can.
I’m getting compared to my sibling again and it sucks.
My crush smiled at me and now I’m overthinking everything.
I got paired with someone in class who literally hates me.
I’m pretty sure I’m the ‘backup friend’ and it hurts.
I want to quit an activity but I feel guilty.
My friend keeps cancelling plans last minute.
Someone keeps making comments about my body and I hate it.
I posted something and now I regret it.
My friend told me they’re struggling and I don’t know how to help.
I got a detention and I don’t even think it was fair.
I’m nervous about talking to the school counselor.
I feel like I’m always the one starting conversations.
My friend’s parents don’t like me and it’s awkward.
I think I might like someone but I don’t know if it’s mutual.
My friend is pressuring me to do something I’m not comfortable with.
I walked into the wrong classroom and everyone stared.
I lost something important at school and I’m freaking out.
My friend keeps gossiping and I don’t want to be part of it.
I’m getting stressed for no reason and I can’t shut my brain off.
My parents want to talk about college and I’m only in like… tenth grade.
I think my teacher hates me and I don’t know why.
Someone keeps teasing me and I can’t tell if it’s bullying.
My friend got mad because I hung out with someone else.
I’m scared I’m going to fail this class.
I have to do a partner dance in PE and I want to die of embarrassment.
My friend keeps making everything a competition.
My parents are being extra strict for no reason.
I got invited somewhere but I don’t know anyone else going.
I feel like everyone has a ‘thing’ and I don’t.
My friend asked me to keep a secret that feels serious.
Someone I don’t like keeps trying to be friends with me.
I’m nervous to eat in front of people at school.
I just got told ‘we need to talk’ and I’m terrified.
My friend keeps sending me snaps at like 2am and I’m exhausted.
My parents keep asking who I’m texting.
I can’t tell if someone is flirting with me or just being nice.
I got grounded and it feels unfair.
I’m stuck in a friend group where people are always arguing.
I messed up in front of everyone and I can’t stop replaying it.
My friend is being super clingy and I need space.
Someone said something racist/sexist in class and the teacher ignored it.
I keep procrastinating and now everything is piling up.
I got a bad grade and I’m scared to tell my parents.
I think my friend is using me to get closer to someone else.
My friend’s new friends are kinda mean and it’s changing them.
I want to change how I look but I’m scared people will comment.
I’m getting headaches from stress and I don’t know what to do.
Someone keeps ‘joking’ about fighting me and it’s not funny anymore.
I feel left out even when I’m literally with my friends.
I got asked out and I don’t like them that way.
I like two people at the same time and I feel guilty.
My parent read my diary/notes and I feel so violated.
I feel like I’m doing my best and it’s still not enough.
